fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Slash someone with your sword
-Carol at someone’s house (Only useable in the month of December)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Attacking someone BMs them if they survive, as you puncture their lungs with your sword
-Caroling at someone’s house will fill their heart with Christmas joy, and will be unable to kill for the next 2 nights. If they attempt to do so anyways, attack them along with your target
-You may not speak in day chat, but you may whisper to people as well as receive whispers. When it is December, you may only speak using lyrics from popular Christmas songs
